snippet: After a grueling debate, lawmakers voted to legalize the practice in exceptional cases where doctors deem the woman’s life to be at risk from her pregnancy.
abstract: Lawmakers in Ireland vote 127 to 31 to back country's first bill on abortion, legalizing practice in exceptional cases where doctors deem woman’s life to be at risk from her pregnancy.
lead_paragraph: After a grueling debate, lawmakers voted to legalize the practice in exceptional cases where doctors deem the woman’s life to be at risk from her pregnancy.

headline.main: Abortion Bill Is Passed in Ireland
